Finally, I checked the top 5 gaining stocks in the USA market to see how AAPL's performance compares to other market movers.

query: Analyze Apple stock (AAPL) by examining its earnings history, fundamental financial data, analyst recommendations, and technical indicators. First, retrieve historical earnings data for Apple. Then gather comprehensive fundamental financial information from EOD Historical Data. Next, collect analyst sentiment through both the general recommendations overview and specific analyst ratings, with a focus on recent downgrades. Finally, analyze technical indicators including Parabolic SAR for momentum detection, Kaufman's Adaptive Moving Average for trend identification accounting for market noise, and the Chande Momentum Oscillator to identify overbought or oversold conditions. Use daily intervals for all technical indicators with a sample size of 50 data points.

tool_list.tool description:
A company's earnings are its after-tax net income. This is the company's bottom line or its profits. Earnings are perhaps the single most important and most closely studied number in a company's financial statements.
This API **also** returns **historical earnings**

tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Fundamental Data API
tool_list.tool description:
Simple access to fundamental data API for stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds, and Indices from different exchanges and countries. Almost all major US, UK, EU, India, and Asia exchanges.

Stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds fundamental data

Major US companies supported from 1985, more than 30 years and non-US symbols supported from 2000, it’s more than 21 years of the financial data. Symbols from major US exchanges (around 11000 tickers in total from NYSE, NASDAQ, and ARCA) 20 years both yearly and quarterly. For minor companies, we have data for the last 6 years and the previous 20 quarters. And the data is continually growing.
We support more than 20.000 US Funds. Our database has equity funds as well as balanced and bond-based mutual funds.
We also support details for more than 10,000 ETFs from different exchanges and countries.
We provide Index Constituents (or Index Components) data for all major indices all around the world.
Please note, not all companies report the whole financial data, then we can not guarantee that each company will have all data endpoints we do support.
Due to a very complex data structure, we support fundamental data feeds only in JSON format.

Availability: Mega plan
Data weighting: 100 API credits per symbol

Availability: Mega plan
Data weighting: 75 API credits per symbol

tool_list.tool description: Money Flow Index(MFI) is used to identify overbought and oversold levels in an asset. In some cases, it can be used to detect divergences, which might be a sign of upcoming trend changes.
Ichimoku Kinkō Hyō(ICHIMOKU) is a group of technical indicators that shows trend direction, momentum, and support & resistance levels. Overall it tends to improve the accuracy of forecasts.
Kaufman's Adaptive Moving Average(KAMA) is a type of Moving Average(MA) that incorporates market noise and volatility.
Rate of change ratio 100 scale(ROCR100) calculates the ratio with 100 scale between the current price and price n timeperiods ago. Formula: (price / prevPrice) * 100.
Average Price(AVGPRICE) uses the formula: (open + high + low + close) / 4.

query: The analysis focused on NVIDIA (NVDA) stock by gathering comprehensive data from multiple sources. First, insider transaction data was retrieved from EOD Historical Data API for NVDA.US starting from July 29, 2023, to understand how company insiders were trading their shares. Then, using Webull's API with tickerId 913256162, the current analyst ratings and price targets for NVIDIA were obtained. To understand earnings expectations, the analysis included EPS revisions from Twelve Data showing how analysts have adjusted their earnings forecasts for NVIDIA in recent weeks and months, complemented by earnings trend data from YFINANCE. The investigation also included recommendation trends from Mboum Finance to gauge overall market sentiment toward NVIDIA stock. For technical analysis, multiple indicators were examined using Twelve Data's API with consistent parameters (1-day intervals and 50 data points): MACD to identify momentum shifts, CCI to detect overbought or oversold conditions, TEMA for smoothed trend identification, ADOSC (Chaikin A/D Oscillator) to analyze volume-price relationships, and ROCR100 to measure price change momentum on a percentage scale. This comprehensive approach combined fundamental data (insider activity, analyst opinions, earnings forecasts) with technical indicators to develop a well-rounded view of NVIDIA's stock performance and potential future direction.

Triple Exponential Moving Average(TEMA) smooths out price fluctuations, making it more trend detection and more transparent without the lag.
Chaikin A/D Oscillator(ADOSC) is an indicator, which finds the relationship between increasing and decreasing volume with price fluctuations.

tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Macroeconomics Data and Macro Indicators API
tool_list.tool description:
Macroeconomics is a part of economics dealing with the performance, structure, behavior, and decision-making of an economy as a whole. Our Macroeconomics Data API includes regional, national, and global economies. We provide the data for more than 30 macro indicators such as GDP, unemployment rates, national income, price indices, inflation rates, consumption, international trades, and many other significant indicators.

The Macroeconomics Data API is a part of Fundamental API and accessible under Fundamental subscription. Each Macroeconomics API request consumes 1 API call. To get macroeconomics indicators use the following URL:

> https://eodhistoricaldata.com/api/macro-indicator/COUNTRY?api_token=YOUR_API_TOKEN&fmt=json&indicator=inflation_consumer_prices_annual

**COUNTRY**: String. REQUIRED. Defines the country for which the indicator will be shown. The country should be defined in the Alpha-3 ISO format. Possible values: USA, FRA, DEU…
**api_ token**: String. REQUIRED. Your api_token to access the API. You will get it after registration.
**indicator**: String. OPTIONAL. Defines which macroeconomics data indicator will be shown. See the list of possible indicators below. The default value is ‘gdp_current_usd‘.
**fmt**: String. OPTIONAL. The output format could be ‘json’ for JSON and ‘csv’ for CSV output. The default value is ‘json’.

For all three indicators, I retrieved 60 data points to ensure sufficient historical context for the analysis.

This endpoint leverages the Financial Data API's extensive financial instruments database to provide developers with actionable insights into fund performance, enabling accurate analysis and comparison. Part of a comprehensive platform offering real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, it supports advanced financial application development with precise, structured information. Availability requires a Mega plan, with 200 API credits consumed per symbol.

task_description: This task assesses the overall mood or sentiment surrounding a particular stock by combining quantitative analysis of news media with real-time data from social platforms dedicated to trading and investing.

query: Analyze NVIDIA (NVDA) by retrieving the Aroon Oscillator (AROONOSC) technical indicator data with daily intervals for the past 90 data points, gather insider holder information including recent transactions and ownership percentages, and obtain dividend payment history for the last 24 months to understand the company's trend strength, insider activity, and dividend performance.

tool_list.tool description: The Aroon Oscillator (AROONOSC) endpoint analyzes trend strength and persistence by calculating Aroon Up and Aroon Down metrics, providing insights into whether existing trends will continue. This tool is part of a comprehensive financial data platform that offers real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, enabling developers to integrate robust market analysis capabilities into their applications. By leveraging the Aroon indicators, it helps traders assess potential trend reversals and make informed decisions based on extensive market data.

Retrieves insider holder information for a specific stock, including insider transactions, ownership percentages, and filing dates. This endpoint leverages the Mboum Finance Official API, which provides comprehensive financial data across stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, and SEC filings, offering real-time insights into corporate governance and investor behavior to help stakeholders make informed decisions.

query: Fetch the latest news about Nvidia (NVDA) from two different financial data sources. First, retrieve up to 50 recent news articles from Financial Modeling Prep's Stock News API. Then, collect comprehensive news coverage about Nvidia from EOD Historical Data's Financial News API, focusing on the period between December 1-31, 2023, with a maximum of 1000 results. The search should specifically target ticker symbols NVDA and NVDA.US respectively.

tool_list.tool name: Financial Modeling Prep: Stock News API
tool_list.tool description: Fetches the latest stock news from reputable sources, including video and article content about companies in the stock market. This endpoint leverages the Extensive Financial Data API, which provides real-time and historical data on over 70,000 stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, and indexes, to deliver timely and relevant financial news updates. By integrating this capability, users gain actionable insights into market trends and company performance through curated, up-to-date information.

tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Financial News API
tool_list.tool description: Retrieves company news filtered by date, news type, and tickers. This endpoint is part of the comprehensive financial APIs offering over 30 years of live/delayed, fundamental, and technical data, including end-of-day prices for stocks, ETFs, and mutual funds across 60 global exchanges, enabling precise news retrieval and analysis. Each request consumes 5 API calls.

To stay informed on official corporate communications, I retrieved 30 messages from verified Investor Relations users. Finally, I checked my private conversations by accessing 15 of my most recent direct messages.

task_description: This task assesses the overall mood or sentiment surrounding a particular stock by combining quantitative analysis of news media with real-time data from social platforms dedicated to trading and investing.

query: I accessed StockTwits to gather recent market information from multiple sources. First, I checked the home stream to see the latest 25 posts from users and stocks I follow. I then looked at my direct messages and mentions to check for any personal communications or public replies. I also viewed posts specifically from users I follow through the friends stream. To get stock-specific information, I retrieved the 25 most recent messages for three major tech stocks: Apple (AAPL), NVIDIA (NVDA), and Tesla (TSLA). Finally, I checked for official communications by viewing the latest posts from verified Investor Relations accounts. This comprehensive approach gave me a complete picture of both personal interactions and market sentiment across key tech stocks.

task_description: This task assesses the overall mood or sentiment surrounding a particular stock by combining quantitative analysis of news media with real-time data from social platforms dedicated to trading and investing.

query: Perform a comprehensive technical analysis on NVIDIA (NVDA) stock using hourly data with a sample size of 30 data points. First, calculate the Minus Directional Movement (MINUS_DM) to understand downward price momentum. Then, analyze the True Range (TRANGE) to measure price volatility. Next, compute Kaufman's Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA) with a 9-period setting to identify the adaptive trend. Finally, retrieve the current best bid/ask prices for cryptocurrency markets from Bybit to compare with traditional market indicators.

tool_list.tool description: Calculates the Minus Directional Movement (MINUS_DM) by subtracting the current low from the previous low. This endpoint is part of a financial data API that provides real-time and historical data on stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more, enabling developers to analyze market trends and make informed decisions. Access the documentation here: [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).

Calculates the true trading range of an asset to determine its normal volatility, serving as a foundational metric for technical analysis. This is part of the financial data platform that provides real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, enabling developers to build tools that leverage precise volatility measurements for informed trading decisions.

Calculates Kaufman's Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA) to adapt to market volatility and noise, providing traders with dynamic trend-following insights. This endpoint leverages the parent tool's financial data infrastructure, which offers real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, enabling developers to integrate adaptive technical analysis into trading strategies with precision.

Returns the best order price across all cryptocurrency symbols when no specific symbol is provided. This endpoint leverages Bybit's public data infrastructure, which offers real-time cryptocurrency prices, charts, and market data for derivatives, futures, spot trading, and USDC contracts, enabling users to access aggregated market depth information efficiently.

query: The user explored various StockTwits data streams, first checking the most recent 20 messages for Tesla (TSLA) stock. They then examined messages from three specific users: MarketMaven, TechTrader, and ValueHunter, limiting each search to 20 messages. The user also looked at messages from verified Investor Relations customers, checked their home stream of followed users and stocks, viewed messages from users they follow in their people stream, examined a specific watchlist with ID 12345, and finally reviewed public mentions of their handle. Each query was limited to 20 results instead of the default 30.

task_description: This task assesses the overall mood or sentiment surrounding a particular stock by combining quantitative analysis of news media with real-time data from social platforms dedicated to trading and investing.

query: The user accessed multiple StockTwits streams in the following sequence: First, they retrieved 25 recent messages from their personal watchlist (ID: 12345). Then they checked top messages for specific stocks - 20 top messages each for Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), and NVIDIA (NVDA). After reviewing stock-specific content, they browsed 15 messages from their home stream containing posts from users and stocks they follow, followed by 15 messages from their 'friends' stream showing only posts from users they follow. They then checked 15 recent mentions of their username (public replies), and retrieved all 30 of their recent direct messages (private conversations). The user also viewed 10 messages from verified Investor Relations customers. Finally, they looked at the details of a specific message (ID: 987654321).

query: The user accessed multiple StockTwits data streams to gather financial market information. They first viewed their home feed (limited to 25 messages) and their friends' posts (25 messages). They checked their direct messages (15 messages) and mentions (filtered since message ID 987654321). The user then focused on specific stocks, retrieving 20 top-rated messages for Tesla (TSLA), 20 recent messages for NVIDIA (NVDA), and messages for Apple (AAPL) posted after message ID 1122334455. They also viewed 10 recent messages from a user named 'MarketPro', checked a personal watchlist (ID: 54321) with 30 messages, and finally viewed 10 recent messages from verified Investor Relations accounts.

tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Get Exchange Details
tool_list.tool description:
With this API endpoint you will get detailed information about each exchange we do support, including:

- Timezone – the timezone of exchange
- isOpen – boolean value which indicates if exchange open right now or closed.
- Trading hours and working days – open hours with working days for each exchange in the exchange timezone. This field could include also lunch hours if the exchange has it.
- ActiveTickers – tickers with any activity for the past two months.
- UpdatedTickers – tickers updated for the current day.

Get the list of the top gaining or losing mutual funds today.

Top gainers are ordered by the highest rate of price increase since the previous day's close. Top losers are ordered by the highest percentage of price decrease since the last day.

Availability: Ultra plan
Data weighting: 100 API credits per symbol

First, I retrieved the company profile using Financial Modeling Prep, which provided basic information like stock price, market capitalization, company description, industry classification, and leadership details. I then analyzed ownership structure by examining fund holders data from Twelve Data (specifically for AAPL on the NASDAQ exchange in the United States), which showed institutional investment patterns. This complete analysis provided a well-rounded view of Apple's financial position, performance, and ownership structure.

Finally, I examined BTCUSDT cryptocurrency price movements in the linear derivatives market by retrieving daily index price klines between November 10, 2023 (timestamp 1699574400000) and December 10, 2023 (timestamp 1702166400000). tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Fundamental Data API
tool_list.tool description:
Simple access to fundamental data API for stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds, and Indices from different exchanges and countries. Almost all major US, UK, EU, India, and Asia exchanges.

Stocks, ETFs, Mutual Funds fundamental data

Major US companies supported from 1985, more than 30 years and non-US symbols supported from 2000, it’s more than 21 years of the financial data. Symbols from major US exchanges (around 11000 tickers in total from NYSE, NASDAQ, and ARCA) 20 years both yearly and quarterly. For minor companies, we have data for the last 6 years and the previous 20 quarters. And the data is continually growing.
We support more than 20.000 US Funds. Our database has equity funds as well as balanced and bond-based mutual funds.
We also support details for more than 10,000 ETFs from different exchanges and countries.
We provide Index Constituents (or Index Components) data for all major indices all around the world.
Please note, not all companies report the whole financial data, then we can not guarantee that each company will have all data endpoints we do support.
Due to a very complex data structure, we support fundamental data feeds only in JSON format.

Returns the amount of the company’s available stock owned by institutions (pension funds, insurance companies, investment firms, private foundations, endowments, or other large entities that manage funds on behalf of others).

Availability: Mega plan

tool_list.tool name: EOD Historical Data: Macroeconomics Data and Macro Indicators API
tool_list.tool description:
Macroeconomics is a part of economics dealing with the performance, structure, behavior, and decision-making of an economy as a whole. Our Macroeconomics Data API includes regional, national, and global economies. We provide the data for more than 30 macro indicators such as GDP, unemployment rates, national income, price indices, inflation rates, consumption, international trades, and many other significant indicators.

The Macroeconomics Data API is a part of Fundamental API and accessible under Fundamental subscription. Each Macroeconomics API request consumes 1 API call. To get macroeconomics indicators use the following URL:

> https://eodhistoricaldata.com/api/macro-indicator/COUNTRY?api_token=YOUR_API_TOKEN&fmt=json&indicator=inflation_consumer_prices_annual

**COUNTRY**: String. REQUIRED. Defines the country for which the indicator will be shown. The country should be defined in the Alpha-3 ISO format. Possible values: USA, FRA, DEU…
**api_ token**: String. REQUIRED. Your api_token to access the API. You will get it after registration.
**indicator**: String. OPTIONAL. Defines which macroeconomics data indicator will be shown. See the list of possible indicators below. The default value is ‘gdp_current_usd‘.
**fmt**: String. OPTIONAL. The output format could be ‘json’ for JSON and ‘csv’ for CSV output. The default value is ‘json’.
tool_list.API name: Macroeconomics Data and Macro Indicators API

Also, calculate the rate of change ratio (ROCR100) for TSLA with daily intervals over the past 90 periods to analyze price momentum. Finally, get options data for Tesla to evaluate market expectations and potential volatility. This combined information will provide a well-rounded view of Tesla's current financial position, market sentiment, price momentum, and future trading expectations.

query: Perform a comprehensive technical and insider analysis for NVIDIA (NVDA) by first calculating the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) using standard parameters (12-period fast, 26-period slow, and 9-period signal) on daily price data. Then, analyze trend strength by determining the Average Directional Movement Index Rating (ADXR) with the standard 14-period setting on daily intervals. Finally, examine insider trading activity by retrieving all recent insider holder information for NVDA, including transaction details, ownership percentages, and filing dates to understand how company executives and board members are trading their own stock.

tool_list.tool description: Calculates the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) by subtracting the longer-term moving average from the shorter-term one, using historical price data with an unstable period of approximately 100 periods. This endpoint leverages Twelve Data's financial API, which provides real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, enabling developers to analyze market trends and momentum efficiently. Learn more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).

Calculates the Average Directional Movement Index Rating (ADXR), a smoothed version of the ADX indicator, to quantify momentum changes in financial markets. This endpoint leverages the parent tool's financial data infrastructure, which provides real-time and historical data across stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, and indices, to deliver accurate ADXR values for technical analysis. By utilizing advanced algorithmic processing of market data, ADXR helps traders identify trend strength and potential reversals, offering actionable insights for informed decision-making.

Retrieves insider holder information for a specific stock, including insider transactions, ownership percentages, and filing dates. This endpoint leverages the Mboum Finance Official API, which provides comprehensive financial data across stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, and SEC filings, offering real-time insights into corporate governance and investor behavior to help stakeholders make informed decisions.

tool_list.tool description: Identifies upcoming asset momentum using Parabolic SAR data. Analyzes financial time series data using the Hilbert Transform SineWave (HT_SINE) algorithm to identify cyclical patterns and trend directions. This endpoint leverages the Hilbert Transform, a mathematical signal processing technique described in 'Rocket Science for Traders' by John F. query: Analyze Ethereum (ETH) price trends and momentum indicators using multiple timeframes. First, retrieve weekly historical data for ETH in USD markets. Finally, examine cycle patterns in ETH/BTC daily price movements using the Hilbert Transform Dominant Cycle Phase indicator to identify potential trend reversal points.
